title: Episode 265: Tragedy & True Crime at the Jean Harlow House
description:
Some say the Jean Harlow house where she lived with her husband Paul Bern is one of the most haunted homes in America. The house certainly saw its fair share of tragedy and deaths which we’ll cover in this episode. You might be shocked to find out the house even has a connection to the Manson family!

Fate Article mentioned at the end of the episode

As always, thank you to our sponsors:
